## Steps to reproduce

The PowerShell 7.1.0 (Microsoft Store Version) Start menu icon is too large.  There is also no text on the tile underneath the icon.  

Reinstalling PowerShell does not resolve the issue.

**Screenshot showing PowerShell icon compared to correct Start menu icons:**

![PowerShell Icon](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/27423064/99883049-98d90d00-2c1c-11eb-9333-03a43f9ac273.png)


I'm not sure whether it's related to the changes that were made to the Start menu in Windows 10 20H2, as I haven't installed in on earlier Windows versions.


## Expected behavior

The Start menu icon should be the same size as other icons and also have the 'PowerShell' text label on the Start menu tile underneath the icon.

title: PowerShell 7.1 (Microsoft Store Version) Start Menu Icon is Too Large and Has No Text Label
